properties.entry: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NM, MEMBER_GENDER, SUBSTR(MEMBER_DOB, 1,4) || '년 ' || SUBSTR(MEMBER_DOB, 5,2) || '월 ' || SUBSTR(MEMBER_DOB, 7,2) || '일' AS MEMBER_DOB, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_TEL FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND MEMBER_PW = ? AND SECESSION_FL = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_PW = ? WHERE MEMBER_PW = ? AND MEMBER_NO = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET SECESSION_FL = 'Y' WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND MEMBER_PW = ?
